name: Ling: A Road Alone.
description:
Ling: A Road Alone. is a top-down hack and slash game, the role of player will start a journey of finding his true self from snow mountain to sand dune.

Following the call of inner heart, the young man starts another journey of adventure. Faced with tough enemies and fierce fights, it is not certain whether the young man can reach the “final”. The only choice is moving forward with determination and clenched fists swinging great sword.

“LING” is the pronunciation of the Chinese character “泠”. The world of “LING” tries to create an environment with coldness, wither, and cool, which are also the meanings of the character “泠” under different situations.

1 player
